issue.title: Use flatbuffer fields in java implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-259](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-259). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The value vectors in the java implementation should switch to using the Field and types as defined in the flatbuffer spec.
